website_summaries.verdict: Good-quality machine that offers numerous different control options. Fully programmable operational modes.
pros: Able to program it using a smartphone app
Can make use of vertical or horizontal oscillation or both
Slightly larger than newer Plus model
Allows you to create and program drills for practice
cons: So many options for programming the machine that it can be confusing

customer_reviews.title: I love the 12 preprogram drills
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tennis ball machine that I purchased. I love the 12 preprogram drills. You can modify the setting according to your preference. It's so convinient to use especially I can control via my iPhone & apple watch. I'm so happy with its performance. Spinshot customer service is great & very helpful. They walk me through & answers thoroughly all my questions & clarifications on how to use the spinshot ball machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good with Samsung Galaxy S10
customer_reviews.text: I had some technical issue with my app and a minor defect. However, the customer service worked with me very closely(even responded me during weekend in several hours when I emailed them). Eventually, they were able to solve the issue. In general, the ball machine is very sturdy and responsive. I am trying to learn different functions every day to make my training more efficient. (1st review after one 2 month) Android remote app worked great for the first month then started freezing after using 2 min. I have been working with their tech until now who seems very responsive but the issue has not been resolved yet. Without the app, this is impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It came with a crack in the other side of the battery. The remote function with smart phone does not work well. The app to machine responsiveness is poor and you end up turning your phone on to reconnect which you lose time if you are on a drill. Drills are not well programmed, so balls fly off the court unless you correct the position of the machine. But the worst is that it stopped working all together on its 6th trial. The app to machine is dead-
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. I'm using tourna pressureless balls. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I'm using tourna pressureless balls. Wifi with phone is little disappointing. The connection keeps dropping and it fails to connect the first time. You can't stop the unit using phone to conserve battery. I meant the motor never stops. You have to physically turn off the switch. Also the wheels are too small to move around uneven surfaces. Usually the walk path from parking lot to tennis court is uneven which makes us to carry the unit instead of rolling it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Spinshot player and it came with a missing nut bolt, but customer service fast delivered a replacement nut bolt asap. The machine is heavy, but it's not that bad, you'll need the weight for recoil anyways. When the machine fires shots, it's pretty consistent, you can control the spin, speed, angle of every shot if you wanted to. The only thing about the machine that I can give constructive feedback for is make the feeds shoot faster balls, other than that no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Famous Egg

customer_reviews.title: love our new spinshot player
customer_reviews.text: love our new spinshot player! works great! great for training younger players because stand next to student and give pointers while they are hitting balls, and can pause the action when needed with the phone app. phone communicates flawlessly with the machine
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Performance review
customer_reviews.text: It has been over 3 weeks since I bought this . Used it over 10 times now . Me and son have started enjoying this a lot . All the practice drills are great and really helpful . So far we had no issues with the machine . In the coming months I hope to see a good improvement in our game with our Spin shot player companion.
customer_reviews.author: Prajith Pavithran

customer_reviews.title: i bought this machine 2 years ago and i still recommend it
customer_reviews.text: i wanted 2 years to write a review as i wanted to tested it before recommending it... it works greats and i can use my Apple Watch as a remote control. In the two year i have used it, i had some issues with the wireless connection and it turned out that it was due to some problems with the electric board - i contacted them and sent pictures / videos and they sent me a new board. The customer service is prompt and great, which is essential for the longevity of this machine. My tennis techniques were improved quite a bit thanks to this machine.
customer_reviews.author: CoupDeGrace

customer_reviews.title: It works perfect and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: It have been a year since I got this ballmachine. It works perfect and easy to carry. My tennis skill improved significantly. forehand ,backhand,volley overhead,slice you name it you can get all kind of shot from this. I don’t need to take expensive drill class at tennis club anymore. And their customer service team is superb. I get instant response from them and they fix every issue. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: masahiro fujimori

customer_reviews.title: i enjoy playing with the machine
customer_reviews.text: has it for 1 month. ball placement for the same drill from day to day are not consistant. the machine seems to loose its original rate. i don't knows whether it was because of our balls wearing out after 1 month. i will buy new balls to see how it goes. hope it works. other than that, i enjoy playing with the machine. my game improves a little and my kids could do some practice too
customer_reviews.author: Secret shopper

customer_reviews.title: very expensive but it works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive thing i ever purchased. i have a tennis court at my house and always wanted one. it's very expensive and smaller than i thought it would be. but it works really well. I use it with non pressurized balls. it is a very big work out.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball machine - works on american home sport courts.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! It was easy to setup - even on my not quite regulation size sports court.I had to turn down the speed to 15 on most of the drills and all was good. The phone app works great and reconnects very fast if you pick up the phone after you played a set of balls. Now creating some fun drills for the summer to get back in shape!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Muench

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to have my own tennis ball machine. The cost of those models in the club is too high to justifying owning one. The Spinshot player is affordable and with enough functions. The question is if the real product is good enough to make the investment meaningful. After two weeks with the machine, the answer to me is affirmative. Received from China in less than 4 days. The App works great. The machine is powerful and consistent enough. It is quiet as well, not too heavy to carry for a short distance. The battery lasts at full power for about one hour. Overall, it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: This is a game changer, literally
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this spinshot ball pitching machine. It throws very accurately. I am a left-handed tennis player and this machine is as easy for me to play with as for right-handed players. Its controls are simple and easy to operate. The phone app is amazing. The machine overall is remarkably good. It has been improving my game remarkably.
customer_reviews.author: dingdong

customer_reviews.title: Good tennis ball machine, compact and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Good tennis ball machine, compact and solid. When tuning to lowest speed (1) and highest angle (50), the machine can stay at the T-spot and throw soft balls barely over the net, perfect for a beginner to hit the ball at the other T-spot. With a higher speed (15) and spin (7), the machine throw balls that are deep and have moderate spin, which is good for ground stroke practice. When fully charged, the battery can easily last 2 hours with moderate feed speed (8) and ball speed.
customer_reviews.author: XYJ.

customer_reviews.title: A hitting partner that won't quit
customer_reviews.text: After you get a product you always find that one thing you find missing or you should have thought about. The Spinshot player is not that product. The only feature that the Player does not come with is picking up balls for you. There are other tennis ball machines out there, but none of them come with all the features, there will always be a feature missing, whether it is a remote, random direction, random height or the ability to program 11 different drills. If you want a ball machine that you can use for years and years without missing any features, and with great customer support, the Spinshot Player is the tennis ball machine for you.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Meyer

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer, new fan
customer_reviews.text: Wow. My first foray into the tennis ball machine game and I am impressed. I spent a bit of time researching various models keeping my budget in mind. I decided to go with the Spinshot Player and it is living up to it's hype. Delivered as expected with the battery arriving separately a day later. Installed battery and got it charging. Easily portable, relatively lightweight. Installed the app and figuring out editing the drills was very straight forward. So far, so good. Look forward to countless hours improving my game.
customer_reviews.author: Friend of Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and great support
customer_reviews.text: I received my Spinshot-Player Tennis Ball Machine with Phone Remote Support. Technical support was available when I called, even on a Saturday morning! My email questions were answered. Everything came as ordered. It was super easy to put it together. And the machine worked great. We have had a blast using it. I saw improvement with my boys the very first day.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great ball machine with easy and remote configuration
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Unlike some reviewers, I received the battery (sent separately) the same day the Player arrived. It took about 5 minutes to remove a wheel and install the battery. I was very impressed that the calibration out of the box was spot-on. The remote on Android was intuitive and functioned as advertised. Default drills were great. Looking forward to spending many productive hours improving my game with this great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tobit

customer_reviews.title: Convenient machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for practice when you don't have a hitting partner. Wheels are small and could be bigger and made of softer rubber so it doesn't make so much noise when hauling it. Only had it for a few months, using it 2x a week or so. So far it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mindfulbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Just started tennis a few months ago and this product is really going to help me get better faster. A lot of balls and programs to work on the shots I needed to improve on. Was easy to set-up and customer service sent email right after the purchase to let me know about the battery coming separate due to shipping policies and told me to reach out on any issues during set-up and startup. Overall extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MSP

customer_reviews.title: served the purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year-old son a few days ago. Today is our very first use of it. It's indeed heavy for me - a skinny anemic Asian woman. At first, we're a little worried. However everything turned out very smoothly- installing the battery, charging it, transport it to the tennis court and ready- set- go... My son practiced 1.5 hr with the machine today- it's his longest self-play ever. He's so happy with it, even though drill 7-12 were still challenging to him. On the way home, he said to me:" Mom, I think the purchase is a success!"
customer_reviews.author: chopin

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Service
customer_reviews.text: The Spinshot player is not only a great ball machine, but I was highly impressed with how they stand behind their product. I had a few minor issues arise and when I brought it to their attention they reacted instantly and resolved my issues with no questions asked. With an investment like this it is very comforting to me that there was such strong and helpful customer service. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Futterknecht

customer_reviews.title: The BEST ball machine on the market yet !
customer_reviews.text: After researching all the tennis ball machines, I decided to go with the Spinshot Player model (best model) based on its capabilities, functionality and the style. Currently, I only tried it once at a local tennis court for 1 hour. I LOVE it very much. It gives me the “drill” I need to practice all my shots. In addition, I can adjust all the setting on my I phone and Apple Watch. I will update my review later after a few more try.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramy Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Really great machine--well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This machine lives up to its billing. It consistently hits you the ball as you program it. Speed, height, spin, direction. You have a permanent 24/7 partner whenever you want. Tech support was great. I had a small issue with the handle and they jumped on it immediately. The remote app works well. The only thing I don't like is that the machine has to be on to re-program it. It would be nice to be able to change the settings in the privacy of your home. Maybe the next version of the software will do that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment for any level of tennis player
customer_reviews.text: The ball machine is easy to set up, including the easy-to-download iPhone app via the App Store. Ranging from beginner to more advanced player, the machine immediately provides a range of outstanding hitting options. We easily programmed the iPhone app to personalize various speeds, spins, and heights. The fully-charged battery provides for a solid hour of training. The machine's well-constructed wheels and handle make transporting it to the court easy, but the relatively heavy weight prevents my wife from easily lifting it to a raised shelf to store. Taken together, this machine is an excellent investment for any level of tennis player.
customer_reviews.author: leslie raynor

customer_reviews.title: App cannot control the player drills at all.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Got excellent support from customer service team. Was able to resolve the issue. Now the machine is working as expected. Greatly satisfied with the machine. :) Previous post: Bought this product because of good review. But could not use because it was malfunctioned. All the drills cannot program. And seller is nowhere to be reached. Hope they will see this review to help me out. Will update with better if the issue can be resolved. $1500 for the machine that cannot be used, is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect ball machine for me
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to use right out of the packaging. Very little setup and easy to understand directions. I would like a better handle to pull the machine with. My does not come up very far and does not stay locked in the up position. This does not effect the great performance of the machine. It just makes it a little harder to get on and off of the court. I would recommend this machine to most skill levels.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Youngberg

customer_reviews.title: Basement Practice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the machine to use in our basement for practice. Works really well. We are able to alter the speed, spin, and height so we can easily hit into a mat on the other side of the room. We programmed the drills from our phone to work backhand, forehand, and volley. No complaints and getting a great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Getdowns

customer_reviews.title: All the Bells & Whistles
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have named our Spinshot Player “Hercules.” While it didn’t take a Herculean effort to learn how to use it, there is a bit of a learning curve. This machine can do a lot! We’re already seeing improvements in our ground game. We definitely recommend this ball machine. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nora McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Great machine downgraded by a cheap ass handle.
customer_reviews.text: Machine is awesome. Lots of functions, power, battery is great, easy to move around, holds a bunch of balls, BUT... Would be a 5 Star for sure if not for the incredibly, flimsy, poor quality, poorly made handle. Really guys??? It’s not like this in an inexpensive machine!!! Spend a few more bucks on a quality handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for a Beginner Looking to Improve
customer_reviews.text: Excellent experience overall. The Spinshot is consistent and a good way to get a lot of practice on the court. Customer service was very helpful with some of the initial glitches. Be sure to use older tennis balls, since newer tennis balls often get stuck in the machine. The battery life could be a little but stronger, given the cost, but it’s possible to hit for 5-6 sessions without recharging the battery. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gil Morton

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect machine to improve your tennis game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Spinshot. I’ve never been able to make progress on my game as much as I have been able to with this. I get so much practice and due to my busy schedule, it’s difficult to find people to go play with. However, with this screenshot player, I can practice anytime and get a lot of hits in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and user friendly to have phone remote option
customer_reviews.text: I used the spinshot ball machine this past weekend and i was very satisfied with the product. I like the product and it will help me improve my game. Also, the product and the battery was shipped in a timely manner. I didn't find any issues in the packaging and the products were delivered safely to me. i appreciate the great service.
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth Ravinder

customer_reviews.title: Great next gen ball machine, phone app control is the game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is the next generation for tennis ball machines. The app control is great. The ability to customize drills on the app on demand and off network is the game changer for this category and worth at least $250 more for similar types. Though there were few hick ups during delivery and timing of the battery, however the guys at spinshot made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Pragnya

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Spinshot Ball Machine now for over a month and love the product! I wish I had this ball machine when I was playing tennis competitively as a teenager. The drills are customizable on a range of areas like ball spin, ball speed, height, left to right (horizontal). Every time I take out the ball machine, I get inquiries on where to buy the machine. Worth every dollar, if you want to improve the fundamentals of your tennis game.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product - exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as advertised. It’s been a game changer for my game to be able to set up entire workouts (programming the ball to go to different places across the court). Although heavy, it’s easy enough to pull around with the wheels and extended handle. Would recommend for any player looking for a great all around ball machine!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Works great, set up was easy, and immigration with iPhone works well. Provides a great combination of ball hight, speed and spin
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball machine!
customer_reviews.text: The spinshot player is the best ball machine we’ve used so far! It’s a great addition to improving your tennis game. Love how we can change drills from our phone or Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.author: NB1998

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 weeks in with this machine and I absolutely love it! With the app integration it's super easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 2 weeks in with this machine and I absolutely love it! With the app integration it's super easy to use from the other side of the court, there is almost perfect flexibility is customizing your drill sequence and there's plenty of power and pace to make this machine ideal just everyone that's isn't a pro. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Purple Pride

customer_reviews.title: Versatile ball machine for the modern age!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball machine! First one I’ve ever owned, and did a lot of research comparing similar options from Lobster and and TennisTutor, etc, and landed on the Spinshot Player. Phone remote control works great, it has a durable build, has a regular shape which makes it easy to transport, and very flexible drill settings.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Best price to features ratio but max ball speed is a bit slow
customer_reviews.text: Best price to features ratio, I think. You get a clean, consistent ball every time, making it easier to build muscle memory. The iPhone app works well and is useful to control the machine, especially when you need to pause it because you pulled a cramp or what not. But I think that's pretty much it. Don't expect to practice receiving fast balls and practice playing in a high-pace environment. This machine, at max speed, only feeds "easy" balls, and I'm really just beginning to play. Overall, I'm happy with it. May need to upgrade to something more beefy in a few years, something with more power.
customer_reviews.author: ABRAHAM D YANG

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for practice
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine and easy to use. Used it before snd happy to have my own now
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Although I wish it came with the ability to plug it into an AC outlet, I guess you can't complain when a product does exactly what it is described as doing.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Spinshot is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our Spinshot this morning : absolutely love it: easy to assemble, light weight, works smoothly - every one is happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Clifford L. Penner

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, good shot variety - everything I was looking for. I was nervous about being able to lift it into my car but it was fine!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Spinshot delivers everything it says. Excellent integration with Iphone app and iwatch, making practice session seamless. Also the customer service is top notch, all the staff online or email is instant feedback and takes care of any issues right away.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Sung

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, just note ball speed/rate
customer_reviews.text: For the cost that it is given, and its reliability, this machine is great! Just note that the ball speed and rate may be slightly unsuitable for high performance tournament players. Other than that, it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Purvi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product, easy to setup and install and use. App is good but will improve over time I am sure. Throws off a variety of balls. Great way to play/train alone. I recommend it highly. Battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine in June. Machine became erratic after 1 month. Does not follow the program - shot out the ball very fast and continuously. Very dangerous. Reinstall the app did not help. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Marangoni

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We got the Spinshot this week and love it. My niece is playing tennis for her high school and is very good but she has been wanting to improve even more and practice a lot more. She was so excited to get this and has been using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an advanced player
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product for a 4.0 player ... top speed may be a bit slow for a 4.5+ player, but overall I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David R Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought a player machine 5 months ago, immediately I liked the product, it becomes my tennis partner, I can just go play whenever I want, easy set up. Great after sell service too.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Whoo

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: We have had a fantastic experience with our new machine. Love having the remote. The company is quick to respond to questions. And the machine is very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Biedenstein

customer_reviews.title: Battery?
customer_reviews.text: Hi. When will the battery arrive? The charger was broken in 10 pieces. I can not rate this product now because I dont know if or how it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Bengt Svensson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not what I wanted and still have not received a way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with my buying experience. Spinshot is easy to deal with and the ball machine is better than I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: working nice for me
customer_reviews.text: working nice for me. The battery is not sold seperately it is deliveried seperately. After 2-3 hours hitting, I need one night to charge. great prodect...
customer_reviews.author: Happyhouse

customer_reviews.title: quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Spin shot was responsive to my issues. I am enjoying this product, best decision I have made
customer_reviews.author: Dean Burns

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product and I purchased a battery since ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and I purchased a battery since it did not come with one. I charged up the battery fully, and took it to the tennis courts the next day. The part that rotates the balls did not rotate to deliver the balls to the part of the machine that shoots out the balls. I manually placed a ball in the hopper, and the ball did shoot out, however it went so low that it did not even go over the net. I tried charging the unit again, however with the same results. It has never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Rich W

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied—can’t use!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered with no battery and never received and broken battery box.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Richter

customer_reviews.title: Trouble
customer_reviews.text: No tech support, keeps breaking. Impossible to mail it or to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my Spinshot Player,
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the quality of construction of my new Spinshot Player. Beautiful, silent and totally versatile in terms of programming functions " impressive ". This video explains well my Spinshot [...] I ordered the "Hybrid Module" so, I can use it all day. I am totally satisfied with my purchase. My wife too love it. I recommend it for anyone who likes quality with honest price.
customer_reviews.author: Normand D.

customer_reviews.title: maquina fallada
customer_reviews.text: the machine is in perfect conditions to train, it is excellent to recommend it for all levels of training.
customer_reviews.author: mariela

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value for quality and functionality. Love that it works with the iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to trainer every day, easy to choose the speed I love the machine very good
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Sambrano

customer_reviews.title: Good tenis machine that excite you in trainning
customer_reviews.text: As advertized, it works well. But wifi is not always works well So i give 4 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... stars because the preset drills should be a much better experience. I only had time to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I left 3 stars because the preset drills should be a much better experience. I only had time to use it once and the preset drills tossed most of the balls into the net. I don't know if it was a defective machine or it was just the drills so I had to return it because I didn't have time to test it further. I was planning to do a YouTube video review because the only one out there seemed to be biased but the experience was too disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine is incredible... I wish I had two more of them.
customer_reviews.author: jamar r. hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product with awesome support!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a machine which can help us to effectively use our time at the court and at the same time have features to support our training needs as our game improves. This is a great product. With an app support, it is pretty easy to setup a training routine based on the areas that you want to focus and effectively execute it every time. There is no setup time, throws are consistent & predictable and with a tap on the app you can move to the next drill. The Spinshot customer service is awesome. They went far and beyond to help me and have been very responsive. It is refreshing to see such an exceptional product support.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj

customer_reviews.title: Too disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered yesterday but I could not turn on the machine! The user manual was not helpful. It was not a manual for $1,600 product. Too disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris, Buford, GA

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I got the machine and it turned on but never worked. I will be returning. Also battery pack is inconveniently loaded behind wheel ans wheel needs to be removed the put battery in. Wheels seem flimsy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Advanced Tennis Ball Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this the ball machine. I was looking for a machine in order improve my game as I progress, which means that I need a some what more advanced than the basic ball feeding function, but also doesn't break the bank either. After few consideration, I decided on the Spinshot-Player and I am happy that I did. The ball machine does what I was needed. In addition, I was able to add another external battery to the machine to double up the practicing time without too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: nice ball machine
customer_reviews.text: It works great for me. Kids like it very much. The phone remote works really good. The battery last long enough. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Q1984

customer_reviews.title: Good news is easy fix less than 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Ball machine was not working properly. It appears sensors are a common problem. Good news is easy fix less than 30 seconds. Customer service, Richard, very friendly and helpful with email response how to fix it within 5 min of calling the 800 number.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Works much better than my old Tutor tower. iPhone compatibility great and easy to use. Directions could be a little better on how to adjust settings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Spinshot-Player Tennis Ball Machine (Best Seller Ball Machine in the World)
product_meta.description:
Spinshot-Player is the most advanced battery operated portable tennis ball machine in the world. Revolutionary design can customize your drills and program height, direction, spin, speed for each of 6 sequential shot and then save that into your personalized drill. Easy programming, you can make 2-line drill at any width and any height. You can make vertical oscillation with combined horizontal oscillation, or whatever oscillation mode you want to play with. All these can be made on your phone and saved into the machine. Next time when using the machine, just press the drill-x button, you can start your game.The Player Model was developed to be incredibly user-friendly and can be operated by even the youngest of players. Size of machine is 50CM(H), 45CM(L), 30CM(W) and weighs 19kg. It is lighter and more compact than any other ball machine with similar features. Towing wheels inc. 

A smart battery charger inc. Customer need order Power Module as an optional part. Battery option can be ordered for free, and main power module will be ordered at the price of $129. To fit the module into the machine is super easy and it can be referred from the UM" Android and iPhone based remote application is free to be offered to control the machine.SPINSHOT PLAYER machine is now supporting the iPhone Remote Control for free. The user can even download free iPhone app from the apple store and try the app before order the machine. Troubleshooting steps Ball speed too low This can be caused by the fact that the battery can’t hold charge. User can measure the voltage of battery in using to verify. It can also be caused by the controller card. Machine only throws balls to left/right side of court This is the typical symptom when customer did not place machine properly after machine finish its initialization. Please follow UM or contact spinshotsports for more support from company.
feature_bullets: Any Type of Drill Can be Easily Programmed on the Tennis Ball Machine
Only Tennis Ball Machine not Made of Plastics, Weight Only 19kg
Free Phone App Provided to Program Speed, Spin, Height, Angle and Feed Rate to Make your Favorite Drill
Only Tennis Ball Machine with Patented De-Jam Design
